projects.name: UR - Self Order App
projects.description: UR - Self Order is a convenient app that simplifies the process of ordering food from your favorite restaurant. All you need to do is take a seat and place your order at the table, and your food will be promptly delivered. Created using Flutter

projects.name: UR POS - App Kasir & Wirausaha
projects.description: UR POS is an application designed to help partners or merchants manage their point-of-sale operations, including order processing and report viewing. It's a tool that simplifies these tasks for businesses. Created using Flutter

projects.name: Air Quality Index

projects.name: Rock Paper Scissors
projects.description: Rock Paper Scissors is a simple hand game that is often used to make quick decisions between two people. The game is typically played by two individuals who each simultaneously form one of three shapes with an outstretched hand. Created using Flutter
